description: Your body is processing the last meal and absorbing nutrients.
what_to_eat: Water, green tea, or black coffee.
recommendations: Avoid eating again; let digestion finish.

description: The body starts using liver glycogen for energy.
what_to_eat: Water, black coffee, or mineral water.
recommendations: Stay busy and drink water every hour.

description: Glycogen reserves deplete and fat burning begins.
what_to_eat: Water with electrolytes or green tea.
recommendations: Stay hydrated and avoid excess caffeine.
tip: Your body starts real fat burning.

description: Ketosis activates: your body uses fat as its main energy source.
what_to_eat: Water with pink salt or clear broth.
Water, herbal teas, or green tea.
recommendations: Avoid intense exercise; listen to your body.

description: Autophagy begins: cells remove waste and regenerate.
tip: Your body is cleansing at the cellular level.

description: Damaged proteins degrade and cells renew themselves.
Your immune system strengthens and produces new cells.
recommendations: Avoid strong caffeine and prioritize rest.
tip: Your body is rebooting from within.

description: Your metabolism becomes efficient and stable in prolonged ketosis.
Maximum cellular regeneration achieved; time to break your fast.
recommendations: Break your fast slowly and with gratitude.
